allOf.title: manifest
allOf.description:
Used for combining packages into one scannable form that a carrier can use when picking up a large 
number of shipments

allOf.title: se_id
allOf.description: A string that uniquely identifies a ShipEngine resource, such as a carrier, label, shipment, etc.

manifest_id.description: A string that uniquely identifies the manifest

allOf.title: se_id
allOf.description: A string that uniquely identifies a ShipEngine resource, such as a carrier, label, shipment, etc.

form_id.description: A string that uniquely identifies the form

created_at.description: The date-time that the manifest was created

ship_date.description: The date-time that the manifests shipments will be picked up

shipments.description: The number of shipments that are included in this manifest

allOf.title: se_id
allOf.description: A string that uniquely identifies a ShipEngine resource, such as a carrier, label, shipment, etc.

warehouse_id.description: A string that uniquely identifies the warehouse

submission_id.description: A string that uniquely identifies the submission

allOf.title: se_id
allOf.description: A string that uniquely identifies a ShipEngine resource, such as a carrier, label, shipment, etc.

carrier_id.description: A string that uniquely identifies the carrier

allOf.title: manifest_download
allOf.description: Object containing the href link to download the manifest file

href.description: The URL of the linked resource, if any

total.description: The total number of manifests returned

page.description: Current page of the list manifests results

pages.description: Total number of pages for list manifests results

allOf.title: pagination_link
allOf.description: Helpful links to other pages of results

allOf.title: link
allOf.description: A link to a related resource

allOf.title: optional_link
allOf.description: A link to a related resource, or an empty object if there is no resource to link to

href.description: The URL of the linked resource, if any

type.description: The type of resource, or the type of relationship to the parent resource

first.description: The link to the first page of results.  This object will _always_ have an `href` field. If there are no results, then the first page will contain an empty array of items.

allOf.title: link
allOf.description: A link to a related resource

allOf.title: optional_link
allOf.description: A link to a related resource, or an empty object if there is no resource to link to

href.description: The URL of the linked resource, if any

type.description: The type of resource, or the type of relationship to the parent resource

last.description: The link to the final page of results.  This object will _always_ have an `href` field. If there are no results, then the final page will contain an empty array of items.

allOf.title: optional_link
allOf.description: A link to a related resource, or an empty object if there is no resource to link to

href.description: The URL of the linked resource, if any

type.description: The type of resource, or the type of relationship to the parent resource

prev.description: The link to the previous page of results.  The `href` field will only be set when the `page` is 2 or greater.

allOf.title: optional_link
allOf.description: A link to a related resource, or an empty object if there is no resource to link to

href.description: The URL of the linked resource, if any

type.description: The type of resource, or the type of relationship to the parent resource

next.description: The link to the next page of results.  The `href` field will only be set when the `page` is less than `pages`.

links.description: Helpful links to other pages of results
